definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: The people next door were Latvian, the Saulitises.
sentences.chinese: 他们隔壁住着一家拉脱维亚人，姓索利提斯。

sentences.english: 1918 - Latvia declares its independence from Russia.
sentences.chinese: 1918年的今天，拉脱维亚宣布脱离俄国独立。

sentences.english: Latvia is ready to make positive contributions to the development of EU-China relations, said Zatlers.
sentences.chinese: 拉脱维亚愿为促进欧中关系作出积极贡献。

sentences.english: The Gourmet Week is hosted by SAS Hotel and co-sponsored by the Chinese embassy in Latvia .
sentences.chinese: 美食周由萨斯饭店主办，中国驻拉脱维亚大使馆协办。

sentences.english: Eight years later came the night of the Latvians.
sentences.chinese: 8年之后的一个晚上，出了拉脱维亚人的事。

sentences.english: You don’t hate the Latvians, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不恨拉脱维亚人，对吧？

sentences.english: Most of them were Latvian, some Russians, too.
sentences.chinese: 他们大多是拉脱维亚人，也有些俄罗斯人。

sentences.english: The restaurants have only European and Latvian food.
sentences.chinese: 餐馆只食用欧洲和拉脱维亚食物。

sentences.english: I had a conversation with the woman representing Latvia.
sentences.chinese: 我和一位代表拉脱维亚的妇女聊了会儿。

sentences.english: The Latvian government and police are investigating the security breach.
sentences.chinese: 拉脱维亚政府和警方正在调查这起安全事件。

sentences.english: The system is also being implemented in Latvia and Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 系统目前正在拉脱维亚和香港履行相关合同。

sentences.english: It’s sort of like a zither, but Latvian.
sentences.chinese: 就像古筝似的，但是拉脱维亚式的。

sentences.english: Russian champion Semberas will miss the Lithuanian national team's FIFA World Cup qualifier against Spain tonight due to strained knee ligaments .
sentences.chinese: 同时他也将缺席拉脱维亚对西班牙的世界杯外围赛。

sentences.english: Latvian businesses are welcome to invest and do business in China.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎拉脱维亚企业到中国投资经商。

sentences.english: “They did not do that because they was Latvian, ” says Dad.
sentences.chinese: “他们那么做，并不因为是拉脱维亚人，”我爸说。

definition: Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania
